content.rendered:
Directed by Jonathan Rigg. Tetsuaki Watanabe.

Written by Taku Kishimoto.

Cast Aaron Dismuke (Hyoma Chigiri 2). Drew Breedlove (Meguru Bachira 2). Alex Hom (Rensuke Kunigami 1). Kamen Casey (Reo Mikage 1). Aaron Campbell (Jingo Raichi 1). Kyle Igneczi (Gurimu Igarashi 1). Spencer Liles (Asahi Naruhaya). Matthew Elkins (Zantetsu Tsurugi). Anthony DiMascio (Okuhito Iemon). Derick Snow (Jinpachi Ego). Blake Shepard (Ryosuke Kira). Erica Muse (Fan). Matthew David Rudd (Shoei Barou). Nicholas Markgraf (Additional). Christian Thorsen (Additional Voices). Kristian Eros (Additional). Kelly Greenshield (Reporter). Bryson Baugus (Seishiro Nagi). Van Barr Jr. (Additional Voices). Mark Allen Jr. (Wataru Kuon). Jamie Snowden (Team W Player 8).

Language Japanese.

Production 8bit.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 23

Status On Going (2022–)
